text:
Heartbreaking.
Jason Hargrove was behind the wheel of a bus in Detroit when he said a passenger began to cough. The woman let loose four or five times without covering her mouth.  Nearly two weeks after he recorded a video of his concerns, he has died.  https://t.co/NLmCryjNo6

urls.title: 'Take This Serious': Bus Driver Dies Of COVID-19 After Calling Out Coughing Rider
urls.description: "I feel violated," Jason Hargrove said, in a widely shared video complaining of selfish behavior during the coronavirus pandemic. Nearly two weeks later, the Detroit driver is dead of the disease.
